trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipula o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand"> </xref> evento o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: When sorting is enabled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control to `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> controls are rendered in the header of each column.
trans-unit.target: Quando a classificação está ativada, definindo o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle `true`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton>controles são processados no cabeçalho de cada coluna.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A>

trans-unit.source: These links allow you to sort the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control by the selected column.
trans-unit.target: Esses links permitem que você classifique o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>controle pela coluna selecionada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.SortCommand> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton> control is clicked.
When you create a DataGridSortCommandEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um delegado DataGridSortCommandEventHandler, identifica o método que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
